There is an similar error if I start up without open panels and try to open the first connection:

Steps to reproduce:

1. In options set "always show panel selection dialog...", but not "create an empty panel on start"
1. Open the first connection
1. Empty panel selection dialog appears, choose new to create an new panel
1. Click "OK" to create the new panel
1. Error appears

notes:
AI triage (claude): Error dialog appears when creating the first panel, likely due to DocumentStyle switch in ConnectionWindow or null/empty WindowList edge case in panel creation flow.
Approach: Investigate PanelAdder.AddPanel catch block and ConnectionWindow.ShowHideConnectionTabs for the condition that triggers the error on first panel creation; add guard for empty WindowList and handle DocumentStyle transition safely when no existing panels are present.
